movie.title: The Great Debaters
movie.plot: The true story of a brilliant but politically radical debate team coach who uses the power of words to transform a group of underdog African-American college students into a historical powerhouse that took on the Harvard elite.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 11 wins & 9 nominations.

events.title: the Wiley Debate team beat the reigning champions
